title: Director, Strategic Partnerships (Global Accounts)

description:
Why Lytx

As the Director of Strategic Partnerships for Global Accounts, you get to be the driving force behind crafting and orchestrating multifaceted strategies for impactful and high-profile partnerships. These initiatives not only result in substantial sales volume but also create fresh opportunities that align seamlessly with the goals, outcomes, and forecasts of both Lytx and our valued partners. In this role, you'll orchestrate success with the largest, highest producing partnerships within the company! You'll play a key role in crafting worldwide alignment working within sophisticated organizations with expansive global operations. You will be instrumental in driving revenue growth, growing market presence, and ensuring the success of our solutions through strategic channel partnerships. Apply your deep business and partnership development expertise to accelerate partner sales around the world and drive strategic alignment from the C-suite on through to ensuring execution at a local level. You will deliver both a long-term vision of the partnership and short-term execution plans. You'll benefit from an incredibly robust support network within Lytx, making proficiency in cross-functional alignment and execution absolutely crucial. Are you ready to embark on an exciting career journey? We encourage you to apply now and be a key player on our dynamic team!

You’ll Get To
• Collaborate with partners to align business objectives, marketing strategies, and sales efforts
• Develop a multifaceted multi-year partner plan detailing critical insights and new business opportunities aligned to partner priorities
• Define and communicate clear objectives, performance metrics, and key performance indicators for channel partners
• Lead and coordinate a diverse cross-functional team and key partners on plan execution and drive accountability to deliver on the partner plan
• Advise the execution of strategies to ensure engagements yield substantial sales, drive plans to increase revenue potential, and identify new opportunities
• Enact strategy for affecting transformation for partners to build solutions and apply an ecosystem-wide perspective to better position partner growth at all levels
• Ensure a comprehensive understanding of partner’s business needs, priorities, strategies and industry insights, market competitive trends, and the customer's customers across their team
• Initiate collaborative opportunities with key partners internally and externally, along with business and technical partners developing, sharing, and promoting mutually beneficial, customizable joint investment plans to grow sales and partner impact, using relationships, and proven experience
• Collaborate with relevant internal and external partners and resources to inspire change on behalf of the customer and to enhance team capabilities, improve Lytx offerings, and adapt Lytx’s messaging to the assigned account
• Use strategic proposals to develop and present compelling value proposition presentations and specialized business plans for customers that showcase Lytx products and solutions to connect decision makers in the account
• Earn and maintain status as a trusted advisor to the account's business decision makers by providing ideas and narratives, using proven experience, establishing ongoing cadences, and bringing together the end users
• Stay on top of industry trends, market dynamics, and competitive landscapes within the telematics sector
• Lead contract discussions with telematics partners to ensure mutually beneficial agreements
• Ensure compliance with contractual terms and conditions
• Other duties as assigned

What You'll Need
• 10+ years experience working in partner channel tech sales
• 5+ years proven experience working with large strategic partnerships
• International experience preferred
• Travel up to 50% is required
• Proven track record navigating sophisticated, international partnerships

Benefits
• Medical, dental and vision insurance
• Health Savings Account
• Flexible Spending Accounts
• Telehealth
• 401(k) and 401(k) match
• Life and AD&D insurance
• Short-Term and Long-Term Disability
• FTO or PTO
• Employee Well-Being program
• 11 paid holidays plus 1 inclusive holiday per year
• Volunteer Time Off
• Employee Referral program
• Education Reimbursement Program
• Employee Recognition and Appreciation program
• Additional perk and voluntary benefit programs

Salary is based on a number of factors including market location and may vary depending on job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. This position is also eligible for an incentive compensation plan. The expected hiring salary for this position is:

$157,750.00 - $199,250.00

Innovation Lives Here

You go all in no matter what you do, and so do we. At Lytx, we’re powered by cutting-edge technology and Happy People. You want your work to make a positive impact in the world, and that’s what we do. Join our diverse team of hungry, humble and capable people united to make a difference.

Together, we help save lives on our roadways.

Find out how good it feels to be a part of an inclusive, collaborative team. We’re committed to delivering an environment where everyone feels valued, included and supported to do their best work and share their voices.

Lytx, Inc. is proud to be an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer and maintains a drug-free workplace. We’re committed to attracting, retaining and maximizing the performance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. EOE/M/F/Disabled/Vet.
